mapper.insert: insert into summary_staff(summary_project_id, user_id, `username`, `name`, role) values (#{projectId}, #{item.id}, #{item.username}, #{item.name}, #{role})

insert into summary_project_information( summary_project_id, `contact`, `unit`, `place`, `scale`, `role`, `money`, `stage`, `problem`, `probability`, `opponent`, `next_stage`, `working`, `time`, `handler`) values (#{map.id}, #{map.contact}, #{map.unit}, #{map.place}, #{map.scale}, #{map.role}, #{map.money}, #{map.stage}, #{map.problem}, #{map.probability}, #{map.opponent}, #{map.next_stage}, #{map.working}, now(), #{userId})
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id, p.`name`, i.unit, i.place, i.scale, i.role, i.money, i.`handler`, i.summary_project_id, i.id, i.stage, i.problem, i.probability, i.`opponent`, i.next_stage, i.working, i.time, i. contact, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( `name` ) FROM summary_staff s WHERE s.summary_project_id = p.id AND role = 1 ) AS tracker, p.handler = #{id} as permission
FROM summary_project p LEFT JOIN summary_project_information i on p.id = i.summary_project_id GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY i.time DESC

SELECT p.id, i.contact, i.`name`, i.unit, i.place, i.scale, i.role, i.money, i.`handler`, i.summary_project_id, i.id, i.stage, i.problem, i.probability, i.`opponent`, i.next_stage, i.working, i.time, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( `name` ) FROM summary_staff s WHERE s.summary_project_id = p.id AND role = 1 ) AS tracker, true as permission FROM summary_project p LEFT JOIN summary_project_information i on p.id = i.summary_project_id where p.handler = #{id} GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY i.time DESC

SELECT p.id, p.`name`, i.unit, i.id, i.stage, i.problem, i.probability, i.`opponent`, i.next_stage, i.working, cast(i.time AS char(20)) as `time`, i.`handler` FROM summary_project p LEFT JOIN summary_project_information i on p.id = i.summary_project_id where p.id = #{id} ORDER BY i.time DESC
